thread.title: P!nk Shares Family Photo While Breastfeeding Newborn Son
thread.title_full: P!nk Shares Family Photo While Breastfeeding Newborn Son

title: P!nk Shares Family Photo While Breastfeeding Newborn Son
text: Share More P!nk certainly seems to be enjoying life as a mom of two. The "Raise Your Glass" singer posted a sweet Instagram photo on Sunday featuring herself relaxed on a sofa while breastfeeding her 2-month-old son Jameson Moon. Her 5-year-old daughter, Willow Sage, snoozes across her mother's lap. The caption is just as lovely as the photo, as P!nk channels poet Rumi, musing, "I was dead- I came alive. I was tears- I became laughter. Love's wealth arrived, And I became Everlasting fortune." ' In December, P!nk gave birth to Jameson Moon, her second child with her husband of 10 years, Carey Hart.
